description:
At the law firm of Rutberg Breslow, we are proud to serve the people of Poughkeepsie, New York, in matters of personal injury. Our focus and experience include cases of wrongful death, trucking accidents, toxic torts, sexual abuse, professional malpractice, products liability, premises liability, nursing home abuse, medical malpractice, drugs and medical devices, construction accidents, car accidents, brain injuries, birth injuries, auto dealer fraud and animal bites.

We have recovered tens of millions of dollars for the clients of our law firm for injuries sustained due to the poor choices of another. This compensation covers damages for emotional and physical injuries, disabilities, pain, financial damage and disfigurement. Lost income, funeral expenses and medical expenses are often unexpected and can throw a family into debt quickly if they are not cared for properly.

Along with the people of Poughkeepsie, we also represent those in Albany, Middletown, Utica and Monticello. At Rutberg Breslow, we are happy to provide a free initial consultation to anyone who has been injured at the hands of another. We take our 100 years of combined experience, our commitment to integrity and truth, and our desire to help injured people and their families and vigorously advocate for every client's rights.

Individuals who come to our law firm can expect legal assistance based on compassion, work ethic and truth, along with protection from those who would do harm. Our commitment is to only represent the injured and their families in personal injury cases, and we vow to always take our time to get the best possible outcome for everyone.
